channel.title: Could somebody make a video?
channel.description:
So i need to know how can i Dump ("extract") my models.dat (size = 1.2mb) file so i could pick random item models from there and make them .MQO files? Could somebody make a video tutorial?
Would be appreciated and i know there are many others who need this.

item.title: Could somebody make a video?
item.dc:creator: @haksilence haksilence
item.description:
@haksilence wrote:

just get a program called datmaker v1.3. it has an export as mqo option. just file>add file> then your models and just export them somewhere

Read full topic
